Aguav Berry.name: Aguav Berry
Aguav Berry.description: A hold item that restores HP but may confuse.

Air Balloon.name: Air Balloon
Air Balloon.description: When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon will float into the air. When the holder is attacked, this item will burst.

Assault Vest.name: Assault Vest
Assault Vest.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This offensive vest raises Sp. Def but prevents the use of status moves.

Choice Band.name: Choice Band
Choice Band.description: Raises a move’s power, but permits only that move.

Choice Scarf.name: Choice Scarf
Choice Scarf.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This scarf boosts Speed, but allows the use of only one kind of move.

Choice Specs.name: Choice Specs
Choice Specs.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. These distinctive glasses boost Sp. Atk, but allow only one kind of move to be used.

Eviolite.name: Eviolite
Eviolite.description: A mysterious Evolutionary lump. When held by a Pokémon that can still evolve, it raises both Defense and Sp. Def.

Expert Belt.name: Expert Belt
Expert Belt.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a well-worn belt that slightly boosts the power of supereffective moves.

Figy Berry.name: Figy Berry
Figy Berry.description: A hold item that restores HP but may confuse.

Focus Sash.name: Focus Sash
Focus Sash.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. If it has full HP, the holder will endure one potential KO attack, leaving 1 HP.

Iapapa Berry.name: Iapapa Berry
Iapapa Berry.description: A hold item that restores HP but may confuse.

Leftovers.name: Leftovers
Leftovers.description: A hold item that gradually restores HP in battle.

Life Orb.name: Life Orb
Life Orb.description: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the power of moves, but at the cost of some HP on each hit.

Mago Berry.name: Mago Berry
Mago Berry.description: A hold item that restores HP but may confuse.

Mental Herb.name: Mental Herb
Mental Herb.description: A hold item that snaps POKéMON out of infatuation.

Power Herb.name: Power Herb
Power Herb.description: A single-use item to be held by a Pokémon. It allows the immediate use of a move that charges on the first turn.

Rocky Helmet.name: Rocky Helmet
Rocky Helmet.description: If the holder of this item takes damage, the attacker will also be damaged upon contact.

Salac Berry.name: Salac Berry
Salac Berry.description: A hold item that raises SPEED in a pinch.

Wiki Berry.name: Wiki Berry
Wiki Berry.description: A hold item that restores HP but may confuse.
